.
(bad)
.
<p>(bad)</p>
.


copyright
.
(c) (C)
.
<p>© ©</p>
.


reserved
.
(r) (R)
.
<p>® ®</p>
.


trademark
.
(tm) (TM)
.
<p>™ ™</p>
.


paragraph
.
(p) (P)
.
<p>§ §</p>
.


plus-minus
.
+-5
.
<p>±5</p>
.


heart
.
<3
.
<p>♥</p>
.


leftarrow
.
<-
.
<p>←</p>
.


rightarrow
.
->
.
<p>→</p>
.


leftrightarrow
.
<->
.
<p>↔</p>
.


ellipsis
.
test.. test... test..... test?..... test!....
.
<p>test… test… test… test?.. test!..</p>
.


dupes
.
!!!!!! ???? ,,
.
<p>!!! ??? ,</p>
.


dashes
.
---markdownit --- super---

markdownit---awesome

abc ----
.
<p>—markdownit — super—</p>
<p>markdownit—awesome</p>
<p>abc ----</p>
.
.
--markdownit -- super--

markdownit--awesome
.
<p>–markdownit – super–</p>
<p>markdownit–awesome</p>
.
